alert.note: Alert for Beauregard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 9:33PM CST until January 29 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Whisky Chitto Creek Near Mittie Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Kinder ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bundick Creek At Bundick Lake Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday evening at 945 PM CST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING TO EARLY MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bundick Creek at Bundick Lake. * WHEN...From Friday morning to early Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 97.0 feet, Minor flooding begins around the lake, especially the north end of the lake. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CST Wednesday the stage was 95.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late Friday morning to a crest of 97.5 feet Saturday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 97.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Bundick Creek Bundick Lake 97.0 95.6 Wed 8 pm CST 96.5 97.4 97.3 &&
